comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The immortal tenor, after a trans-Atlantic voyage, about to disembark in New York. He arrived on the Kaiser Wilhelm, November 12, 1913, in the company of several other opera singers:

Another shipboard shot of Caruso:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465088814/in/photostream/]

Other opera singers arrived on the same boat:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4464311391/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4546016812/]

comment.author: 25767425@N02
comment._content: Don't stay out there too long. Enrico. It may harm your voice....  : )

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: They don't seem to be worried about harm to their voices. None wear scarves, and Gilly is smoking a cigarette.
